about: I am a full-stack developer and AI/Machine Learning engineer passionate about creating intelligent, fact-based solutions and AI-powered applications. I am fascinated by emerging technologies and have extensive experience in web development and artificial intelligence. As a B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering student at Graphic Era Hill University, I combine traditional development skills with cutting-edge AI solutions to build innovative applications that solve real-world problems. My journey in technology has led me to master both web development and machine learning, enabling me to create intelligent applications that leverage the power of AI.
